com.github.lucbui.bytes

Class Bitmask

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.lucbui.bytes.Bitmask

  • public class Bitmask
extends java.lang.Object
    Encapsulates a Bitmask operation

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  Bitmask.BitmaskMerge
      A merge operation using bitmasks to combine several values into one.

    • Method Detail

      • forBitRange

        public static Bitmask forBitRange(int start,
                                  int end)
        Creates a Bitmask when given a start and an end value. For example, GBATEK specifies a data structure as "Bits 12-15" This method would automatically generate a new Bitmask(0b1111 <<< 12, 12), which would appropriately grab those bits
        Parameters:
        start - The starting bit of the range.
        end - The ending bit of the range.
        Returns:
        A Bitmask that grabs the specified bit range.

      • forBit

        public static Bitmask forBit(int bit)
        Create a Bitmask which extracts exactly one bit.
        Parameters:
        bit - The bit to extract.
        Returns:
        A bitmask that grabs the specified bit.

        public static Bitmask.BitmaskMerge merge(int mergeStart)

        Parameters:

        Returns:
